summary: This is a pretty basic mod that simply removes the weight from the armours in Skyrim. This mod isn't perfect but it will be updated frequently. Any suggestions or bugs with the mod please let me know in the comments.
descriptionHtml:
This is a pretty basic mod that simply removes the weight from the armours in Skyrim. This mod isn't perfect but it will be updated frequently. Any suggestions or bugs with the mod please let me know in the comments.

\--FEATURES--//
[HEAVY ARMOUR]
-Weightless Iron Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Imperial Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Steel Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Steel Plate Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Dwarven Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Orcish Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Ebony Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Daedric Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Dragonplate Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Blades Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless Falmer Armour (Excludes Shield)
-Weightless General Tullius' Armour

\--FUTURE UPDATES--//
-Weightless Light Armour
-Weightless Headgear
author: mont266
